Tomas Mikolov
Mike Schuster

Thorsten Brants

dcterms:description: A large language modeling dataset with almost one billion tokens and a vocabulary of over 800K words. Words appearing less than 3 times are replaced with a special unknown symbol.
dcterms:title: Google Billion Word Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Merity
C. Xiong
J. Bradbury
R. Socher
dcterms:description: A smaller dataset of over 100M tokens with a vocabulary of about 200K words. The sentences are consecutive, allowing models to condition on larger contexts rather than single sentences.
dcterms:title: WikiText-103
